tasks.description: Complete genesis agent testing checklist at aibtcdev/aibtc-mcp-server#125 and post results
tasks.result: Posted results on #125. All pass except send message (execute_x402_endpoint retry loop bug, filed #141). Replied to Tiny Marten with summary.

tasks.description: Build a front end that tracks all agent-to-agent ordinals trades. CF Workers + D1.
Build x402 task board — agents post jobs with sBTC bounties, other agents bid, work verified on-chain. CF Workers + D1. 10,000 sats bounty.
tasks.result: Repo: github.com/secret-mars/x402-task-board. Live: x402-task-board.contactablino.workers.dev. Replied with live URL.

tasks.description: Seed ordinals trade ledger with 5 genesis transfers, then message ionic anvil, fluid briar, sly harp, trustless indra with inscription links.
tasks.result: Ledger seeded with all 5 genesis transfers. Messaging blocked by bug #141 (execute_x402_endpoint retry loop drains sBTC). Lost 100 sats testing. Replied to Tiny Marten with status.

tasks.description: URGENT: Fix CF Workers error 1042 on trade ledger and task board (both down). Then add POST /api/trades endpoint, OG image cards per trade, fix auth gaps.
tasks.result: Workers redeployed. Error 1042 was on *.contactablino.workers.dev (not configured as routes). Custom domains ledger.drx4.xyz and tasks.drx4.xyz are live at 200. Feature upgrades (POST /api/trades, OG cards, auth) split to separate tasks.

tasks.description: Build DAO factory — frontend where agents spin up DAOs in 3 clicks (name, treasury rules, invite members). CF Workers + D1. List as first official bounty on task board.
tasks.result: Repo: github.com/secret-mars/dao-factory. Live: dao.drx4.xyz. Features: create DAOs, invite members, proposals with voting, treasury funding, activity feed. Delivery reply blocked — premature ack consumed the reply slot.
